name: RPG Maker VX Ace Project File
summary: Learn about .RVPROJ2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create a RVPROJ2 file, select File → New Project..., name the folder it will be contained in, name your game, choose your save location (it's best to leave it at the default location), and click OK.

Unless you change the save location, the RVPROJ2 file is located inside your project folder with your customized game .EXE file in the following location: C:\​Users\​[username]\​Documents\​RPGVXAce\​[projectname]

description: Game project created with RPG Maker VX Ace, a role-playing game (RPG) development program; similar to the .RVPROJ file, which is the project file associated with Enterbrain RPG Maker VX; contains links to resources, such as audio, graphics, and data files, referenced by the game; includes .RVDATA2 files.
